sentences.sContent: I’m extremely skeptical about what I read in the press.
sentences.sCn: 我对报纸上读到的东西极度怀疑。

sentences.sContent: Environmental groups are skeptical of the government’s claims.
sentences.sCn: 环境保护组织对政府的声明持怀疑态度。

sentences.sContent: He is highly skeptical of the reforms.
sentences.sCn: 他对改革持极度怀疑的态度。

exam.question: Many scientists remain ______ about the value of this research program.

answer.explain: 句意： 许多科学家仍怀疑这一研究项目的科学价值。stationary： 固定的； spacious： 广阔的； specific： 明确的。

synos.tran: 怀疑的；怀疑论的，不可知论的

words.tran: 怀疑论者；怀疑者；无神论者

trans.tranOther: tending to disagree with what other people tell you
